item.description:
Bike New Haven on a leisurely, 10 mile group ride in support of New Haven's Downtown Evening Soup Kitchen! We'll ride city-endorsed bicycle routes past some of New Haven's finest green spaces in honor of DESK's sustainability campaign, and end with a celebratory BBQ.

See http://www.ridetoendh... for full info on parking and registration, and detailed maps. Registration is $25 for single rider, $35 for double (i.e. tandem bikes or child seats). Register the morning of the ride.

Please consider downloading a pledge form (see ride website above) and collecting donations of $5 or more to turn in at registration. DESK has been serving record numbers of people as operating expenses continue to increase, and every bit helps to support our critical mission.

Don't have a bicycle? You can still support DESK by joining the entire group (motorcyclists, bicyclists, and supporters) at the BBQ lunch after the ride--starting at 1pm--at the Elks Lodge (522-524 State St.) for just $10 (BBQ is free for registered riders, with cash bar).

Your contact for this event is Michelle. I'm also the ride organizer, so I should be easy to identify on ride day, and easiest to get in touch with before 10am on the morning of the event! Meet with me at the AT&T Parking Lot on Grove and State Sts. at 10am to park and ride down with a group to registration, or meet us at ride registration/start at Sports Haven (600 Long Wharf Dr.), where you can park as well. Registration is 9-11am (with free coffee and donuts); ride start is promptly at 11am.

I'll email my cell phone to "yes" RSVP's a couple days before. You can also RSVP on facebook.
item.name: Ride the 1st annual BICYCLE LEG of the Ride to End Hunger for D.E.S.K.!
